risk_factor.name: Sensory Perception
risk_factor.description: Ability to respond meaningfully to pressure-related discomfort

description.name: Completely limited
description.description: Unresponsive (does not moan, flinch, or grasp) to painful stimuli,due to diminished level of consciousness or sedation OR limited ability to feel pain over most of body surface.

description.name: Very limited
description.description: Responds only to painful stimuli.Cannot communicate discomfort except by moaning or restlessness OR has a sensory impairment which limits the ability to feel pain or discomfort over 1/2 of body.

description.name: Slightly limited
description.description: Responds to verbal commands but cannot always communicate discomfort or need to be turned OR has some sensory impairment which limits ability to feel pain or discomfort in 1 or 2 extremities.

description.name: No impairment
description.description: Responds to verbal commands.Has no sensory deficit which would limit ability to feel or voice pain or discomfort.

risk_factor.name: Moisture
risk_factor.description: Degree to which skin is exposed to moisture.

description.name: Constantly moist
description.description: Skin is kept moist almost constantly by perspiration, urine, etc. Dampness is detected every time patient is moved or turned.

description.name: Often moist
description.description: Skin is often but not always moist. Linen must be changed at least once a shift.

description.name: Occasionally moist
description.description: Skin is occasionally moist, requiring an extra linen change approximately once a day.

description.name: Rarely moist
description.description: Skin is usually dry; linen only requires changing at routine intervals.

description.name: Bedfast
description.description: Confined to bed.

description.name: Chairfast
description.description: Ability to walk severely limited or nonexistent. Cannot bear own weight and/or must be assisted into chair or wheelchair.

description.name: Walks occasionally
description.description: Walks occasionally during day but for very short distances, with or without assistance. Spends majority of each shift in bed or chair.

description.name: Walks frequently
description.description: Walks outside the room at least twice a day and inside room at least once every 2 hours during waking hours.

risk_factor.name: Mobility
risk_factor.description: Ability to change and control body position.

description.name: Completely immobile
description.description: Does not make even slight changes in body or extremity position without assistance.

description.name: Very limited
description.description: Makes occasional slight changes in body or extremity position but unable to make frequent or significant changes independently.

description.name: Slightly limited
description.description: Makes frequent though slight changes in body or extremity position independently.

description.name: No limitations
description.description: Makes major and frequent changes in position without assistance.

description.name: Very poor
description.description: Never eats a complete meal. Rarely eats more than 1/3 of any food offered. Eats 2 servings or less of protein (meat or dairy products) per day. Takes fluids poorly. Does not take a liquid dietary supplement OR is NPO and/or maintained on clear liquids or IV for more than 5 days.

description.name: Probably inadequate
description.description: Rarely eats a complete meal and generally eats only about 1/2 of any food offered. Protein intake includes only 3 servings of meat or dairy products per day. Occasionally will take a dietary supplement OR receives less than optimum amount of liquid diet or tube feeding.

description.name: Adequate
description.description: Eats over half of most meals. Eats a total of 4 servings of protein (meat, dairy products) each day. Occasionally will refuse a meal, but will usually take a supplement if offered OR is on a tube feeding or TPN regimen, which probably meets most of nutritional needs.

description.name: Excellent
description.description: Eats most of every meal. Never refuses a meal. Usually eats a total of 4 or more servings of meat and dairy products. Occasionally eats between meals. Does not require supplementation.

description.name: Problem
description.description: Requires moderate to maximum assistance in moving. Complete lifting without sliding against sheets is impossible. Frequently slides down in bed or chair, requiring frequent repositioning with maximum assistance. Spasticity contractures, or agitation leads to almost constant friction.

description.name: Potential problem
description.description: Moves feebly or requires minimum assistance. During a move, skin probably slides to some extent against sheets, chair, restraints, or other devices. Maintains relatively good position in chair or bed most of the time but occasionally slides down.

description.name: No apparent problem
description.description: Moves in bed and in chair independently and has sufficient muscle strength to lift up completely during move. Maintains good position in bed or chair at all times.
